data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Point Arguello, California, USA (ARG)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Point Arguello, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using StowAway Tidbit Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. TBIC32+4+27) beginning 2005-04-12. The instrument depth was 009 meters, in an overall water depth of 015 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
